author.name: Brother Arnulfus
author.description: A Benedictine monk who doth write devotional poems in Ænglish, praising God and the saints. His poems are often humorous and satirical, might contain references to wine or ale.

newsMedieval:
Of Southwest Airlines, hear my tale,
Their flights halted, a mournful wail.
Fast in the heavens above they glide,
Yet, now for a time, they must bide.

In Turkey of old, a trembling land,
Earthquakes storm, yet help is at hand.
Negligence of yore, a heavy cost,
Many a life in quakes hath been lost.

And lo! On the wingèd beast, AI,
Risks the finance function, doth pry.
CFOs, be not timid, nor flee,
Embrace change, let thy coffers be free.

feedItems.title: Southwest Airlines Halts Flights, FAA Says
feedItems.content: Airline implements ground stop, citing ‘intermittent issues.’
feedItems.contentSnippet: Airline implements ground stop, citing ‘intermittent issues.’

feedItems.title: Decades of Negligence and Mismanagement Made Turkey's Earthquake Deadlier
feedItems.content: A comprehensive review shows that widespread problems in the country’s construction boom under the Erdogan government added to the devastating toll.
feedItems.contentSnippet: A comprehensive review shows that widespread problems in the country’s construction boom under the Erdogan government added to the devastating toll.

feedItems.title: AI Is Heading to the Finance Function. Here's How Risk-Averse CFOs Can Adapt.
feedItems.content: Nascent technologies promise to disrupt budgeting and forecasting and automate mundane accounting duties, but inertia among finance chiefs may slow adoption.
feedItems.contentSnippet: Nascent technologies promise to disrupt budgeting and forecasting and automate mundane accounting duties, but inertia among finance chiefs may slow adoption.

author.name: Æthelred the Skald
author.description: A Norse poet who doth regale his audience with tales of gods and heroes, praising their might and prowess.

newsMedieval:
In the midst of St. Barts' balmy seas,
A mighty fortress hath sold, none cant withstand.
For vast sums of treasure, one hundred and thirty-six million,
A record for the island's fair and sundrenched land.

As mighty Amazon in commerce doth wane,
Its landlord still dost weather well the storm.
A titan able to resist challenge to reign,
Untroubled by the tribulations, feared by swarm.

The earnings of banks upon the shores of the New World,
Now chronicled as first-quarter's tale is spun.
A saga to follow and fortunes unfurled,
Watch how U.S. banks in battle's steps have run.

feedItems.title: St. Barts Estate Sells for About $136 Million, a Record for the Caribbean Island
feedItems.content: The roughly 130-acre waterfront property was once owned by David Rockefeller, who used it as a vacation home
feedItems.contentSnippet: The roughly 130-acre waterfront property was once owned by David Rockefeller, who used it as a vacation home

feedItems.title: Amazon's Slowdown Has Yet to Pinch Its Landlord
feedItems.content: Warehouse giant Prologis said rents continued to rise in the first quarter, as U.S. consumers keep spending money online.
feedItems.contentSnippet: Warehouse giant Prologis said rents continued to rise in the first quarter, as U.S. consumers keep spending money online.

feedItems.title: Track How U.S. Banks Are Faring in First-Quarter Earnings
feedItems.content: The industry is under stress it hasn’t seen in years. The Wall Street Journal breaks down the reports to give you a glimpse into the vault.
feedItems.contentSnippet: The industry is under stress it hasn’t seen in years. The Wall Street Journal breaks down the reports to give you a glimpse into the vault.

author.name: Conchobar mac Nessa
author.description: An Irish bard who doth sing of the battles and triumphs of his people, preserving their traditions and history.

newsMedieval:
In days of yore when taxes due,
A tale I sing, forsooth, 'tis true.
The IRS with patience tried,
For fewer folk on hold did bide.

When plagues and pestilence assailed,
By Omicron's dread blow, hearts quailed.
Yet lo! A single dose, a dream,
In U.S. lands shall reign supreme.

Behold brave Canada's resolve,
A Russian ship's fate they'll solve.
To seize and gift to Ukraine's might,
For liberty and freedom's fight.

feedItems.title: Tax Day: IRS Left Fewer Taxpayers on Hold This Year
feedItems.content: The average wait time to speak to a representative dropped 85% this tax season, officials said.
feedItems.contentSnippet: The average wait time to speak to a representative dropped 85% this tax season, officials said.

feedItems.title: Single Dose of Omicron-Targeting Vaccines to Become Main Covid-19 Shot in U.S.
feedItems.content: The FDA also authorized a second Omicron-targeting booster shot for high-risk groups.
feedItems.contentSnippet: The FDA also authorized a second Omicron-targeting booster shot for high-risk groups.

feedItems.title: Canada Plans to Seize Russian Cargo Plane and Give It to Ukraine
feedItems.content: The Canadian government plans to seize a giant Russian cargo plane that has been stuck in Toronto for more than a year and give it to Ukraine to aid that country’s war efforts, according to Ukraine’s prime minister.
feedItems.contentSnippet: The Canadian government plans to seize a giant Russian cargo plane that has been stuck in Toronto for more than a year and give it to Ukraine to aid that country’s war efforts, according to Ukraine’s prime minister.

author.name: Guillemette de Ventadour
author.description: A troubadour from Occitania who doth compose songs of love and chivalry, enchanting all who hear her voice.

newsMedieval:
In distant lands where Muscovites reside,
A court's decree doth hold a scribe confined;
For justice sought or shadows yet to hide,
For truth and honor shall we intertwine.

Proclaim in joy the pow'rs of potions fair,
As Johnson's works of healing do abound;
An outlook raised for noble souls to share,
Their fortunes swell in golden bounties found.

Asseverate the climb of markets grand,
For banks do roll their earnings ever higher;
In harmony with these times' stalwart stand,
As valiant crowds exult unto the spire.

feedItems.title: Russian Court Upholds WSJ Reporter's Detention
feedItems.content: The ruling means Evan Gershkovich will remain in pretrial detention at Moscow’s Lefortovo prison until May 29, although Russian authorities can extend that period.
feedItems.contentSnippet: The ruling means Evan Gershkovich will remain in pretrial detention at Moscow’s Lefortovo prison until May 29, although Russian authorities can extend that period.

feedItems.title: Johnson & Johnson Posts Higher Quarterly Sales, Raises 2023 Outlook
feedItems.content: First-quarter earnings were largely wiped out by a $6.9 billion charge tied to litigation and other costs from its Covid-19 vaccine commitments.
feedItems.contentSnippet: First-quarter earnings were largely wiped out by a $6.9 billion charge tied to litigation and other costs from its Covid-19 vaccine commitments.

feedItems.title: S&P Opens Higher as Bank Earnings Roll In
feedItems.content: Stock indexes moved modestly lower as results from major banks including Goldman Sachs and Bank of America trickled in. Other companies reporting Tuesday included Johnson & Johnson.
feedItems.contentSnippet: Stock indexes moved modestly lower as results from major banks including Goldman Sachs and Bank of America trickled in. Other companies reporting Tuesday included Johnson & Johnson.
